import React from 'react'; import { Bell, X } from 'lucide-react'; export default function AnalyticsConsentModal({ onAccept, onDecline }) { return (

Help Us Improve

Room24 would like to collect anonymous analytics to improve your experience. This helps us understand:

  • • Which features are most useful
  • • How to make the app faster and easier to use
  • • Common issues users encounter

Privacy promise: We never collect personally identifiable information. All data is aggregated and anonymous. You can change this preference anytime in settings.

); }
